name: T.I.N.E 2: Zombies Tower Defence
description:
Follow me on twitter, instagram and youtube!

In TINE 1 we saw the hero escape the maze. 

But then the unthinkable happened!

The developer accidently signed up for a 2 day game jam on the weekend release of his favourite game, Call of Duty ZOMBIES! 

Help our tiny hero fight the hoards of zombies using top down shooter mechanics during the rounds, and build towers to help protect him between rounds.

HOW TO PLAY

WASD or UDLR to move.

During the rounds, mouse shoots.

Between rounds, click on a black square to build towers to shoot the hoard.

Yellow drops are money, purple are health.

And don't DIE!

Mix and Jam 2020

This game was made in 2 days for Mix and Jam Game Jam 2020. The themes was mixing of genres, and I've always wanted to make a tower defence game. The top down shooter aspect was due to the amount of CoD zombies streams were watched during the development.

All sounds and images where generated by me, with the exception of the player and enemy sprite sheets, which I downloaded from: https://krishna-palacio.itch.io/minifantasy-dungeon

Go check him out, super talented!

Big thanks for that Krishna Palacio, hope this counts as adequate credit!
